title: Global Ops: Commando Libya
notes: Seems to run fine – just make sure to use steam runtime, not arch's native-runtime, as it seems to cause problem. The cursor is sometimes invisible in Steam overlay, but only when fullscreen and I had that in other games, so it's not game's fault

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Sandybridge Desktop x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Running perfectly, I do not advise playing on dedicated HD intel. the FPS will be low, especially in the cutscenes. but it's just aesthetic because it does not interfere with gameplay.
title: Global Ops: Commando Libya
